title: Add a Sample Number Variable
sampleSize: Specify the size of the samples (e.g., 5)
sampleVarName: Specify the name of the sample variable to add (e.g., sample). If the variable name is already present in the dataset, it will be updated

help.title: Add a variable to specify Sample number
help.body:
Description
Add a Sample number variable (i.e. column) to the dataset for a specified sample size to use the sample number to group the data for future data analysis

The sample number variable in the dataset is needed to perform many analysis e.g. Process Capability, Shewhart charts like xbar,R,S, etc
